QuestData.Title: Volcanic Activity
QuestData.Description: Welcome. I'm Williden Marshal, and my sister and I run this expedition of explorers and scientists. You have a moment?$b$bI don't like the look of those elementals on that volcano, $c. We have too much equipment, too many notes... one crazed elemental could streak its way through our camp and do terrible, terrible damage.$b$bShow them that their new neighbors aren't to be trifled with. And bring back the ash that they leave behind... we might as well do a little science while we're at it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 9 samples of Un'Goro Ash from the fire elementals around the volcano in Un'Goro Crater.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you think the volcano is active? I wonder why it didn't explode when the cataclysm hit.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope that did the trick. I'll take the ash... this may come in handy sometime down the line.
